description.full: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  In LEGO® Indiana Jones™ 2: The Adventure Continues, play ALL-NEW levels from The Original Adventures and your favorite new moments from The Kingdom of the Crystal Skull... Or for the first time, create your own levels, for a true one-of-a-kind experience! New levels, vehicles and modes like 2-player split-screen, will let you build and battle your way out of trouble like never before!
description.short: In LEGO® Indiana Jones™ 2: The Adventure Continues, play ALL-NEW levels from The Original Adventures and your favorite new moments from The Kingdom of the Crystal Skull... New levels, vehicles and modes like 2-player split-screen, will let you build and battle your way out of trouble like never before!

media.title: LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues
